plot: A scheming Police inspector tries to defraud an insurance company in a complex plot of murder and prostitution. His plan is ruined by a young outlaw bent on revenging his sisters' disgrace.
title: L'assicurazione
plot_es: A scheming Police inspector tries to defraud an insurance company in a complex plot of murder and prostitution. His plan is ruined by a young outlaw bent on revenging his sisters' disgrace.
plot_en: A scheming Police inspector tries to defraud an insurance company in a complex plot of murder and prostitution. His plan is ruined by a young outlaw bent on revenging his sisters' disgrace.
